mapper.sql: id, auto_id, `uid`, bili_name, bili_coin, bili_exp, bili_upexp, bili_level, face_img, is_vip, vip_due_date, other
mapper.select: SELECT bili_user.bili_name AS bili_name, bili_user.bili_coin AS bili_coin, bili_user.bili_exp AS bili_exp, bili_user.bili_upexp AS bili_upexp, bili_user.bili_level AS bili_level, bili_user.face_img AS face_img, bili_user.is_vip AS is_vip, bili_user.vip_due_date AS vip_due_date, bili_user.`status` AS `status`, bili_user.enddate AS enddate, auto_bilibili.skipDailyTask AS skipDailyTask, auto_bilibili.id AS auto_id FROM auto_bilibili INNER JOIN bili_user ON bili_user.auto_id = auto_bilibili.id

SELECT bili_user.bili_name AS bili_name, bili_user.bili_coin AS bili_coin, bili_user.bili_exp AS bili_exp, bili_user.bili_upexp AS bili_upexp, bili_user.bili_level AS bili_level, bili_user.face_img AS face_img, bili_user.is_vip AS is_vip, bili_user.vip_due_date AS vip_due_date, bili_user.`status` AS `status`, bili_user.enddate AS enddate, auto_bilibili.skipDailyTask AS skipDailyTask, auto_bilibili.id AS auto_id FROM auto_bilibili INNER JOIN bili_user ON bili_user.auto_id = auto_bilibili.id WHERE auto_bilibili.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into bili_user (auto_id, `uid`, bili_name, bili_coin, bili_exp, bili_upexp, bili_level, face_img, is_vip, vip_due_date, other) values (#{autoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{biliName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{biliCoin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{biliExp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{biliUpexp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{biliLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipDueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update bili_user
auto_id = #{autoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bili_name = #{biliName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bili_coin = #{biliCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bili_exp = #{biliExp,jdbcType=BIGINT},

enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
